what: Utilities for creating Civic Infrastructure Assessment reports
title: Utilities for creating Civic Infrastructure Assessment reports
text: Perform data tasks StriveTogether Civic Infrastructure Assessment. Initially, package focuses public data US Census, Wisconsin’s Department Public Instruction, internal data Racine Unified School District.

title: Utilities for creating Civic Infrastructure Assessment reports
text: can install development version herccia GitHub :

what: Import and wrangle WISEDash Local data about students' growth on MAP reading — map_growth_for_k8
title: Import and wrangle WISEDash Local data about students' growth on MAP reading — map_growth_for_k8
text: function reads raw CSV output WISEDash Local wrangles CIA-friendly format. particular, uses "Test Growth Result" field count number students met exceeded growth goal. CAVEAT file name(s) must contain grade information.

title: Import and wrangle WISEDash Local data about students' growth on MAP reading — map_growth_for_k8
Import and wrangle WISEDash Local data about students' growth on MAP reading — map_growth_for_k8
text: .filepath string, one full paths raw data files .basename_prefix string, regex match parts file names appear grade .grade_pattern string, regex match part file name containing grade level .basename_suffix string, regex match parts file names appear grade

title: Import and wrangle WISEDash Local data about students' growth on MAP reading — map_growth_for_k8
text: data frame 9 columns

title: Import and wrangle WISEDash Local data about students' growth on MAP reading — map_growth_for_k8
text: returned value following structure: Grade zero-padded two-digit grade "03" "08" Gender gender identity like "," "Female," "Male," "Non-binary." Race/Ethnicity racial ethnic identity WISEDash's options EL Whether ("Yes") ("") student English Language Learner Year school year YYYY-YYYY format N number children combination Gender, Race, EL met growth goals. D number children combination Gender, Race, EL

what: Import and wrangle WISEDash Local data about Kindergartners' percentile scores on MAP reading — map_percentiles_for_kg
title: Import and wrangle WISEDash Local data about Kindergartners' percentile scores on MAP reading — map_percentiles_for_kg
text: function reads raw CSV output WISEDash Local wrangles CIA-friendly format. particular, converts percentile scores counts Kindergarten readiness considering percentile .standard argument "ready."

title: Import and wrangle WISEDash Local data about Kindergartners' percentile scores on MAP reading — map_percentiles_for_kg
Import and wrangle WISEDash Local data about Kindergartners' percentile scores on MAP reading — map_percentiles_for_kg
text: .filepath string, one full paths raw data files .standard float, minimum percentile count proficient. 0-100 scale.

title: Import and wrangle WISEDash Local data about Kindergartners' percentile scores on MAP reading — map_percentiles_for_kg
text: data frame 9 columns

title: Import and wrangle WISEDash Local data about Kindergartners' percentile scores on MAP reading — map_percentiles_for_kg
text: returned value following structure: File Name basename() .filepath argument Gender gender identity like "," "Female," "Male," "Non-binary." Race/Ethnicity racial ethnic identity WISEDash's options EL Whether ("Yes") ("") student English Language Learner School Year school year YY-YY format N number children combination Gender, Race, EL percentile scores exceeded .standard D number children combination Gender, Race, EL Year school year YYYY-YYYY format Grade Always "KG"
